author: The Film Theorists
description:
*✨ Subscribe to collect your pickaxe!* ► https://www.youtube.com/@FilmTheory/?sub_confirmation=1

After YEARS of development, the Minecraft Movie is ALMOST here and we have something special for you today, Theorists! Grab your pickaxe and get ready to dig into our THREE mini theories based on the new trailers that have been released so far! 

Subreddit post: https://www.reddit.com/r/FilmTheorists/comments/1h0nm14/blue_cube_from_minecraft_movie_translation_lee_i/

title: Film Theory: 3 Minecraft Movie Theories!
